backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a single high-confidence feature to rewrite GlobalServiceSection.tsx to fix flag emoji rendering and country name display issues across all major browsers.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing the purpose and key details of each component, hook, and style file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the ProSellers React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component that composes all landing page sections in order, with SectionConnector components between each section and floating UI elements like ScrollButtons and FloatingSideStrip.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Meet The Founder section featuring a headshot with gold corner accents, credential list with CheckCircle icons, and scroll-triggered slide-in animations for left and right columns.
frontend/src/components/CaseStudiesSecti: Case Studies section displaying three client cards with Recharts BarCharts showing before/after metrics, animated count-up numbers, and scroll-triggered fade-in entrance animations.
frontend/src/components/ComparisonSectio: Renders a side-by-side comparison section contrasting US agencies with ProSellers across cost, attention, and strategy points, using IntersectionObserver for scroll-reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: Displays an accordion-style FAQ section with expand/collapse functionality for questions about ProSellers' Amazon consulting approach, pricing, and communication model.
frontend/src/components/FlagStripSection: Renders an infinitely scrolling horizontal strip of country flags with names using flagcdn.com images, representing the Amazon marketplaces ProSellers serves.
frontend/src/components/FloatingSideStri: A fixed bottom floating bar with phone, email, and calendar booking links that becomes visible after the user scrolls past 700px.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying ProSellers branding, global service regions, copyright year, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/GlobalServiceSec: Displays a grid of four country cards (US, UK, Canada, Australia) with flag images and market descriptions, animated on scroll via IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the hero section with an animated particle canvas background, parallax scroll effect, and a count-up animation for a stats badge that triggers on intersection visibility.
frontend/src/components/HowWeWorkSection: Displays a 4-step growth framework section with staggered reveal animations on scroll, using IntersectionObserver to animate step cards and a desktop connector line between steps.
frontend/src/components/LeadMagnetSectio: Renders a lead magnet section offering a free PPC guide download via an email form, showing a success state with a confirmation message after submission.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with smooth-scroll links, a scroll-aware background/border style change, and a responsive mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/PositioningSecti: Static section targeting ideal customers with a headline and a 2-column grid of bullet points describing the seller profile the service is designed for.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Displays three pricing plan cards (Starter, Growth, Elite) with staggered scroll-reveal animations, feature lists, and CTA buttons, with the Growth plan visually elevated as most popular.
frontend/src/components/ProblemSection.t: Renders a grid of six 'pain point' cards (e.g., High ACOS, Account Suspension) with icons and descriptions, using IntersectionObserver to animate cards into view on scroll.
frontend/src/components/ScrollButtons.ts: Displays fixed scroll-to-top and scroll-to-bottom buttons that appear after the user scrolls 600px, with gold-themed hover styles.
frontend/src/components/SectionConnector: Renders a decorative animated gold pulsing dot with expanding rings, used as a visual divider between page sections.
Displays four service offering cards (Amazon Growth, Brand Development, Emergency Services, eBay Management) with icons and bullet points, animated on scroll via IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/components/StrategyCallSect: Renders a 'Book a Free Strategy Call' section with a two-column layout containing a Calendly placeholder and a lead capture form (name, email, store URL) with a submission state.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Displays a grid of five client testimonial cards with star ratings, reviewer names, and country flags, animated into view using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/components/TrustSecuritySec: Renders a 'Trust & Security' section with four animated cards covering confidentiality, NDA availability, secure payments, and direct communication, using IntersectionObserver for scroll-triggered reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseSection: Renders a 'Why Choose Us' section displaying five value-proposition cards (direct access, cost savings, limited slots, performance, partnership) with scroll-triggered reveal animations via IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, returning either an authenticated or anonymous actor based on the current Internet Identity, and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY AuthClient login/logout state, persisting identity across page reloads and exposing login status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module with no backend queries, exported as an empty object since the app is a static landing page.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Google Fonts and Tailwind, defining CSS custom properties for theming, and declaring utility classes for glassmorphism cards, gold/navy brand colors, shimmer animations, and scroll-triggered reveal transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider into the DOM root.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom brand colors (gold, navy, silver), heading/body font families, box shadows, border radii, and animation keyframes, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state (version 27) for a premium Amazon Growth Consultant landing page (ProSellers/Mayur Sahu), documenting architectural notes, known issues, existing features, and a V4 upgrade roadmap including footer, FAQ, comparison, lead magnet, and Calendly integration.
